articles.content: By Divya Bhati: Malware attacks are not new. Often cyber hawkers target people and infect their smart devices like phones, laptops or desktops with malware to steal their data. The data is later sold… [+5037 chars]

articles.content: The launch of the Nothing Phone (2) is closer than expected. Just recently, Carl Pei welcomed Kyle Kiang, a former OnePlus exec, to the team. Kiang will play the Vice President role in North America … [+1862 chars]
